Title: Relates to posting of certain signs on premises that sell alcoholic beverages and complaints via phone call or website reporting on-premises establishment poses a threat to public health or safety
Summary: Relates to posting of certain signs on premises that sell alcoholic beverages informing residents about the state liquor authority's complaint website and hotline.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to posting of certain signs on premises that sell alcoholic beverages
